data.message: Facebook, where did the birthday reminders go, that used to be on the newsfeed page?  I used it all the time!  Please respond with assistance!

replies.message: Hey Teresa. Your birthday notifications may have been turned off. You can turn them back on by following the steps here: http://bit.ly/2nFyA3j. Hope this helps! -Joe
how can one contact facebook. is there any contact number/
Hey Tessylinda. This is a great place to ask questions. Let us know how we can help. -Joe
Facebook How would I go about getting you to respond to my issue posted 13 hours ago?

Facebook  Hi Joe!  I'm referencing the area on the right-hand side of the newsfeed, in a box that used to be right above the "trending" box.  That is where the birthday reminders used to be.  I am also referencing the version of FB that I use on my laptop, not my mobile device.  I have had my email and text notifications turned off for a number of years.  Any other suggestions?  :)

Thanks for following up with us, Teresa. We're constantly working to improve the Facebook experience for everyone. If there's anything you'd like for us to change, please let us know here: http://bit.ly/2oAaR86. -Joe
Want to see the birthday reminders back in my email/news feeds.
How can I add an existing video from my phone to my facebook page
Hi, Ayden. You can learn how to upload videos to Facebook here: http://bit.ly/2oSHSfX. -Rhea
Facebook seems like my share button on my posts have disappeared and now friends cannot share my posts....do you know why???
